_header: A king governing in kindly goodliness
_description: A verse tag in a collection of sermons by John Waldeby — one couplet

BodLauMis77.Transcription:
a kynge gouernynge in kyndely goudlynessea felichepe faylynge in
                    Manyfolde febulnesse

Coxe,  Henry Octavius.
